premises: The Treaty of Versailles was signed or World War II ended, but not both
The Treaty of Versailles was signed
conclusions: World War II did not end
incorrect conclusions: The Treaty of Versailles was not signed

premises: Napoleon won the Battle of Waterloo or France became a republic, but not both
Napoleon won the Battle of Waterloo
conclusions: France did not become a republic
incorrect conclusions: Napoleon did not win the Battle of Waterloo

premises: The American Revolution succeeded or the French Revolution succeeded, but not both
conclusions: The French Revolution did not succeed
incorrect conclusions: The American Revolution did not succeed
